name: web-texture-tool
description: Utility to efficiently handle loading of a wide variety of texture formats

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run clean && npm run build-webgl && npm run build-webgpu && npm run build-worker && npm run build-basis && npm run build-ktx && npm run build-dds
scripts.build-basis: copyfiles --flat src/workers/basis/basis_transcoder.* build/workers/basis && npx esbuild --bundle src/workers/basis/basis-worker.js --target=es2018 --outdir=build/workers/basis --minify --sourcemap --format=esm
scripts.build-ktx: copyfiles --flat src/workers/ktx/libktx.* build/workers/ktx && npx esbuild --bundle src/workers/ktx/ktx-worker.js --target=es2018 --outdir=build/workers/ktx --minify --sourcemap --format=esm
